question: You are bored in your current job but you enjoy working for your company. You think you would be happier if you moved to a different department in the same company.Write a letter to your employer. In the letterask to be moved to a position in another departmentexplain how you feel about your current position and your careersay why you think changing your job would be good for you and the company
text: I am writing this letter to express some of my concerns regarding my current role at Unison Insurance Broking Limited.

To begin with, I have often witnessed that I have no room for learning and growth, being an assistant marketing manager in your esteemed organisation for the last 3 years. Therefore, I would wish to move to a different department where I can enhance my skill-sets while adding value addition to our organisation.

I believe I can do justice to the role of sales manager as I have  prior professional experience working as a sales executive with a similar company as ours. Furthermore, our organisation is actively looking for a few sales personnel, who can undertake a few additional assignments, achieving their daily sales targets.

If you were to hire me as a sales manager, I would certainly do justice to my roles and responsibilities provided that my track record speaks for itself. I am certain that you would consider my request and I have attached my resume for your consideration.
I look forward to meeting you soon.
